properties.entry: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE (EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_NO, EMAIL, PHONE, DEPT_CODE, JOB_CODE, SAL_LEVEL, SALARY, BONUS, MANAGER_ID, HIRE_DATE, ENT_DATE, ENT_YN) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET PHONE = ?, EMAIL = ?, DEPT_CODE = ?, SALARY = ?, BONUS = ? WHERE EMP_ID = ?
